subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch led 52 laps from the pole and won the Centurion Boats at the Glen to become the first Nascar driver to win three road-course races in one season.
snippet: Kyle Busch led 52 laps from the pole and won the Centurion Boats at the Glen to become the first Nascar driver to win three road-course races in one season.
